entry.title: Caiz.dev Alpha Release Announcement
entry.summary: Caiz.dev has launched its initial release. Caiz.dev is building a new developer community focused on the AI era.
entry.content:
Caiz.dev has launched its initial release. Caiz.dev is building a new developer community focused on the AI era.

Caiz.dev is based on NodeBB. The core system remains untouched, with customization achieved solely through plugins and themes. Plugins and themes are primarily developed using vibecoding. Vibe-coding utilizes Claude Code and Codex.

Caiz means “nautical chart(Kaizu)” in Japanese. We want Caiz.dev to be a presence that supports developers setting sail and propels their growth.
